analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0xf8e6b494195173e2306e6c5861e551d65d0f6123.sol:
	Contract RexCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0xf8e6b494195173e2306e6c5861e551d65d0f6123.sol#225)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0xf8e6b494195173e2306e6c5861e551d65d0f6123.sol#95) is not in mixedCase
